00040   LaAnimalManager::LaAnimalManager(QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00041 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00042 {
00043   //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00044   setupUi(this);
00045   readSettings();
00046   lblAnimalPix->setScaledContents(true);
00047   connect(tblAnimals, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00048       this, SLOT(cellClicked( int,int)));
00049   //connect(pbnAnimalPic, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(on_pbnAnimalPic_clicked()));
00050 
00051   refreshAnimalTable();
00052   //disable these buttons unless experimental is allowed
00053   pbnImport->setVisible(false);
00054   pbnExport->setVisible(false);
00055 }

00062 void LaAnimalManager::readSettings()
00063 {
00064   QSettings mySettings;
00065   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00066   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00067   resize(size);
00068   move(pos);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void LaAnimalManager::writeSettings()
00072 {
00073   QSettings mySettings;
00074   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00075   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00076 }

00078 void LaAnimalManager::refreshAnimalTable(QString theGuid)
00079 {
00080 
00081   mAnimalMap.clear();
00082   tblAnimals->clear();
00083   tblAnimals->setRowCount(0);
00084   tblAnimals->setColumnCount(2);
00085 
00086 
00087   //we do this in two passes
00088   //in the first pass we populate a qmap with all the layersets
00089   //we find....
00090   mAnimalMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00091 
00092   //the second pass populates the table
00093   //doing it from the map ensures that the rows
00094   //are sorted by layerset name
00095 
00096   int mySelectedRow=0;
00097   int myCurrentRow=0;
00098   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimal> myIterator(mAnimalMap);
00099   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00100   {
00101     myIterator.next();
00102     LaAnimal myAnimal = myIterator.value();
00103     qDebug(myAnimal.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00104     if (theGuid.isEmpty())
00105     {
00106       //qDebug("No default active row was requested.Assigning to myAnimal.guid()!");;
00107       theGuid=myAnimal.guid();
00108     }
00109     if (myAnimal.guid()==theGuid)
00110     {
00111       mySelectedRow=myCurrentRow;
00112     }
00113     // Insert new row ready to fill with details
00114     tblAnimals->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00115     QString myGuid = myAnimal.guid();
00116     qDebug ("Inserting animal with guid: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00117     // Add details to the new row
00118     QTableWidgetItem *mypFileNameItem= new QTableWidgetItem(myGuid);
00119     tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypFileNameItem);
00120     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myAnimal.name());
00121     tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00122     //display an icon indicating if the layerset is local or remote (e.g. terralib)
00123     //LaAnimal::Origin myOrigin = myAnimal.origin();
00124     //if (myOrigin==LaAnimal::USERPROFILE)
00125     //{
00126     QIcon myIcon;
00127     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00128     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00129     //}
00130     //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimal::ADAPTERPROFILE)
00131     //{
00132     //QIcon myIcon;
00133     //myIcon.addFile(":/remotedata.png");
00134     //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00135     //}
00136     //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimal::UNDEFINED)
00137     //{
00138     //  mypNameItem->setTextColor(Qt::yellow);
00139     //}
00140     myCurrentRow++;
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (myCurrentRow>0)
00144   {
00145     tblAnimals->setCurrentCell(mySelectedRow,1);
00146     cellClicked(mySelectedRow,1);
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {
00150     on_toolNew_clicked();
00151   }
00152   QStringList headerLabels;
00153   headerLabels << "File Name" << "Name";
00154   tblAnimals->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00155   tblAnimals->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00156   tblAnimals->setColumnWidth(1,tblAnimals->width());
00157   tblAnimals->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00158   tblAnimals->verticalHeader()->hide();
00159   tblAnimals->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00160 }

00162 void LaAnimalManager::cellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00163 {
00164   //note we use the alg name not the id becuase user may have customised params
00165   qDebug("LaAnimalManager::cellClicked");
00166   QString myGuid = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),0)->text();
00167   qDebug("Guid is: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00168   QString myFileName = myGuid + ".xml";
00169   selectAnimal(myFileName);
00170 }
00171 void LaAnimalManager::selectAnimal(QString theFileName)
00172 {
00173   qDebug("selectAnimal Called : " + theFileName.toLocal8Bit());
00174   QString myAnimalDir = LaUtils::userAnimalProfilesDirPath();
00175   LaAnimal myAnimal;
00176   myAnimal.fromXmlFile(myAnimalDir + QDir::separator() + theFileName);
00177   mAnimal=myAnimal;
00178   showAnimal();
00179 }

00181 void LaAnimalManager::showAnimal()
00182 {
00183   leName->setText(mAnimal.name());
00184   leDescription->setText(mAnimal.description());
00185   spinBoxMeatFoodValue->setValue(mAnimal.meatFoodValue());
00186   spinBoxUsableMeatPercent->setValue(mAnimal.usableMeat());
00187   spinBoxKillWeight->setValue(mAnimal.killWeight());
00188   spinBoxGrowTime->setValue(mAnimal.growTime());
00189   spinBoxDeathRate->setValue(mAnimal.deathRate());
00190   spinBoxTDNForGestating->setValue(mAnimal.gestating());
00191   spinBoxTDNForLactating->setValue(mAnimal.lactating());
00192   spinBoxTDNForJuvenile->setValue(mAnimal.juvenile());
00193   spinBoxSexualMaturity->setValue(mAnimal.sexualMaturity());
00194   spinBoxBreedingLife->setValue(mAnimal.breedingExpectancy());
00195   spinBoxYoungPerBirth->setValue(mAnimal.youngPerBirth());
00196   spinBoxWeaningAge->setValue(mAnimal.weaningAge());
00197   spinBoxGestationTime->setValue(mAnimal.gestationTime());
00198   spinBoxEstrousCycleTime->setValue(mAnimal.estrousCycle());
00199   lblAnimalPix->setPixmap(mAnimal.imageFile());
00200 }

00202 void LaAnimalManager::on_pbnAnimalPic_clicked()
00203 {
00204   LaUtils myUtils;
00205   QString myFile = myUtils.openGraphicFile();
00206   lblAnimalPix->setPixmap(myFile);
00207   mImageFile = myFile;
00208 }

00222 void LaAnimalManager::on_toolNew_clicked()
00223 {

00238 void LaAnimalManager::on_toolCopy_clicked()
00239 {
00240   qDebug("Copy toolbutton clicked");
00241   if (tblAnimals->currentRow() < 0)
00242   {
00243     return;
00244   }
00245   //to clone, we get the algorithm guid that is currently selected
00246   QString myGuid = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),0)->text();
00247   if (myGuid.isEmpty())
00248   {
00249     return;
00250   }
00251   QString myOriginalFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml";
00252   LaAnimal myAnimal;
00253   myAnimal.fromXmlFile(myOriginalFileName);
00254   /*
00255   int myCount = 1;
00256   while (mAnimal.contains(myProfileName))
00257   {
00258     myProfileName = tr("Copy ") + QString::number(myCount++) + " of " + myAnimal.name();
00259   }
00260   */
00261   //assign this layerset its own guid
00262   myAnimal.setGuid();
00263   QString myNewFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myAnimal.guid() + ".xml";
00264   myAnimal.setName(tr("Copy of ") + myAnimal.name());
00265   myAnimal.toXmlFile(myNewFileName);
00266   refreshAnimalTable(myAnimal.guid());
00267 }
00268 void LaAnimalManager::on_toolDelete_clicked()
00269 {
00270   qDebug("Delete toolbutton clicked");
00271   if (tblAnimals->currentRow() < 0)
00272   {
00273     return;
00274   }
00275   QString myGuid = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),0)->text();
00276   if (!myGuid.isEmpty())
00277   {
00278     QFile myFile(LaUtils::userAnimalProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml");
00279     if (!myFile.remove())
00280     {
00281       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Landuse Analyst"),
00282       tr("Unable to delete file \n") + myFile.fileName());
00283     }
00284     refreshAnimalTable();
00285   }
00286 }
00287 void LaAnimalManager::on_pbnApply_clicked()
00288 {
00289   mAnimal.setName(leName->text());
00290   mAnimal.setDescription(leDescription->text());
00291   mAnimal.setMeatFoodValue(spinBoxMeatFoodValue->value());
00292   mAnimal.setUsableMeat(spinBoxUsableMeatPercent->value());
00293   mAnimal.setKillWeight(spinBoxKillWeight->value());
00294   mAnimal.setGrowTime(spinBoxGrowTime->value());
00295   mAnimal.setDeathRate(spinBoxDeathRate->value());
00296   mAnimal.setGestating(spinBoxTDNForGestating->value());
00297   mAnimal.setLactating(spinBoxTDNForLactating->value());
00298   mAnimal.setJuvenile(spinBoxTDNForJuvenile->value());
00299   mAnimal.setSexualMaturity(spinBoxSexualMaturity->value());
00300   mAnimal.setBreedingExpectancy(spinBoxBreedingLife->value());
00301   mAnimal.setYoungPerBirth(spinBoxYoungPerBirth->value());
00302   mAnimal.setWeaningAge(spinBoxWeaningAge->value());
00303   mAnimal.setGestationTime(spinBoxGestationTime->value());
00304   mAnimal.setEstrousCycle(spinBoxEstrousCycleTime->value());
00305   mAnimal.setImageFile(mImageFile);
00306   mAnimal.toXmlFile( LaUtils::userAnimalProfilesDirPath() +
00307       QDir::separator() + mAnimal.guid() + ".xml");
00308   refreshAnimalTable(mAnimal.guid());
00309 }
